title: Circular Room
description:
This is a damp circular room, whose walls are made of brick and
mortar.  The roof of this room is not visible, but there appear to be
some etchings on the walls.  There is a passageway to the west.

west.failureMessage: Your way is blocked by an invisible force.

atmosphere: The air is cool and damp.
Water drips somewhere in the darkness.
Your footsteps echo off the stone walls.
